author: Mawdo Jawo
comment: After one week, now I decided to give a review, it looks stunning on a rounded watch, and ok on square watch
title: Love it

author: Stephen Landry
comment: Excellent to look at and fantastic battery consumption! Highly recommended
title: Great face!

author: Mike Williams
comment: Don't like the bird... but still give it 5 stars
title: Great Face

author: Christopher Pilot
comment: It doesn't load the weather app and it says it can't find the flashlight app. Once you go into the alarm there's no swiping that will get you out of it (thank goodness my watch has a hardware button). The app shortcut icons are VERY small and difficult to accurately press. It also took me a while to figure out what they were because they are so small. Sorry, had to refund it.
title: Nice and Original but...
